resources.string: NASA image of the day V 1.0
Choose start date to get pictures
You have selected the picture of
Do you want to add %1$s to the favorites?
Are you sure you want to remove the picture from your favorites?
press anywhere on the screen, a message will come up asking you if you want to add the picture to your list of favourites. press yes if you want to add it.
You can choose which dates you want to search between by filling the start and the end dates then press search.
You can press on any picture to see more details.
You can press on any picture to see more details. If you want to remove a picture you can long press it and a message will come up asking you if you want to remove it from the favorites.
